page.description: Settings for configuring a Label control in the FormView layout.

description.p: The *[ui:Item class name]* property is used to add one or more classes to a Label control in the FormView layout. If the value is blank, the value specified in the 'Form Properties' tab for the '[Item class name]' will be used. If you do not want to use any value you can specify >None<.
